issue.title: Trusty build broken because of protobuf version

content.raw:
I've seen the problem before, I think that it is a temporal problem with the gem installation. Anyway, the [latest builds on trusty were failing during the generation of the protobuf messages](http://build.osrfoundation.org//job/ignition_msgs-ci-default-trusty-amd64/33/consoleFull#-8511200326ea37b8d-a6d4-40ae-8431-d90c018842af).

```
Running C++, and Java protocol buffer compiler on param.proto
Running C++, and Java protocol buffer compiler on packet.proto
ignition/msgs/packet.proto:19:3: Expected "required", "optional", or "repeated".
ignition/msgs/packet.proto:20:3: Missing field number.
make[2]: *** [ignition/msgs/ignition/msgs/packet.pb.cc] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
[ 27%] [ 27%] Running C++, and Java protocol buffer compiler on physics.proto
Running C++, and Java protocol buffer compiler on param_v.proto
make[1]: *** [ignition/msgs/CMakeFiles/ignition-msgs0.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

PR to disable it: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/361/disable-the-build-of-ignition-msgs-on/diff
